Question.Subject: How do you put a link for a download on your blog?
Question.Content: I see people who put links on their blog, and if you click on it, you can download music and such...I think you know what I mean. Like this : http://blog.akutoulovesyou.com/2010/02/dont-cross-streams.html see the link?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You have to upload the music or video to your hosting account. There is a way to upload in wordpress admin but I prefer just to use FTP. Once it is uploaded to your site, then you just post a link to it so others can grab it.
If you need more help or tips, be sure to check out http://www.get-pnb.com

Answer.Content:
you just posted the link.
ѕαкυяα
